reviews.comments: La casa comoda y limpia con buena vista. Los anfitriones geniales. La ubicacion no fue problema porque andabamos con vehiculo. Lugar muy tranquilo y seguro
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos!!!!

reviews.comments: Todo tal cual lo previsto y conversado. Juan y Jenny son realmente superhosts! Siempre atentos y bien dispuestos. La casa es amorosa, calida y con una excelente ubicación. Nada fallo. Destacable 100% la ducha, las camas muy confortables. La vista. Y los anfitriones sobre todo. Para recomendar para volver. Gracias por hacernos sentir como en casa!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos!!!

reviews.comments:
Todo tal cual lo publicado. Atentos, buena onda. 
Jenny nos hizo reservas de excursiones y nos ayudó a organizar los días. 
Limpio, acogedor. Con lindos detalles, como las flores sobre la mesa o fruta y chocolates en la mesada.
Muy recomendable.

Si van a Calafate dudo que encuentren lugar más acogedor que el loft de Juan & Jenny. Todo perfecto: limpieza, recomendaciones turísticas, disponibilidad de los anfitriones para lo que necesitáramos, comodidad y hasta lindos detalles que nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Sin duda los volveremos a elegir si vamos nuevamente por allá y también recomendaremos.

Estuvimos en lo de Juan&Jenny en febrero, con 2 adolescentes. Nos sentimos muy cómodos. La cabaña tiene todo lo que se necesita, es muy limpia y tiene una buena ubicación y excelente vista al lago desde la habitación. Jenny super amable.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Andrea¡¡¡¡¡Fue un placer recibirlos¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Fue una experiencia muy buena. La casa está muy bien equipada, con una excelente ubicación y muy buena vista. Además está muy bien calefaccionada. Jenny y Juan se preocuparon porque no nos faltara nada, nos hicieron sentir como en casa, y nos dieron muy buenos consejos sobre qué excursiones hacer con niños. Y nos recibieron con un budín casero a modo de bienvenida, fue muy lindo gesto.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos¡¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Son muy amables y el lugar es muy lindo. Se ocuparon mucho de explicarnos todas las excursiones. Nos recibieron con una bandeja con cafe y cosas ricas para comer. Tuvimos problemas con el vuelo y ellos estuvieron atentos y compresivos a la hora de resolver el tema del alojamiento y ayudarnos a reorganizar nuestro viaje. 

Sin duda volveríamos!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Fue muy placentera la estadía en la casa de Juan y Jenny. El lugar es excelente y las atenciones y consejos de ellos nos ayudaron mucho y nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Ojalá podamos volver pronto.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Gonzalo¡¡Un placer recibirlos¡¡Los esperamos nuevamente¡¡

reviews.comments: Nuestra estadía en el loft de Juan y Jenny fue excelente! Los chicos fueron buenísimos anfitriones, Jenny nos ayudo con recomendaciones respecto de actividades en Calafate, excursiones, donde comer. Siempre preocupada de que estuviésemos pasando buena estadía, tanto antes, durante y después de nuestro viaje. La casa está perfectamente equipada ( cocina completa, ropa de cama), súper confortable y todo funciona perfecto (wifi, calefacción, ducha). La ubicación del loft es buenísima, a media cuadra del Lago Argentino y a pocas cuadras del centro, en una zona muy linda y cómoda para manejarse a pie. Recomiendo 100% la casa de Juan & Jenny!!!! Creo no podríamos haber encontrado mejor lugar donde hospedarnos!!!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Mae, fue un placer tenerlas!!!Las esperamos nuevamente!!

reviews.comments: La casa es muy acogedora, amplia y con todo lo necesario para una excelente estadía.  El centro esta a pocas cuadras, a 6 se encuentra el almacén y a 30 metros hay una panadería y confitería y a una el lago, por lo tanto se puede hacer todo caminando. Jen y Juan super atentos, me dieron consejos sobre excursiones, qué hacer, datos, etc. Están siempre dispuestos a ayudar. Nos hicieron pasar una excelente estadía, los recomiendo ampliamente. Muchas gracias chicos por todo.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Caro!!!!Fue un placer tenerlos en casa y en Patagonia!!!!

reviews.comments:
La estadia en lo de Juan y Jenny fue genial! 
Nos ayudaron en todo lo que necesitamos, nos dieron ideas y consejos  para nuestras excursiones, haciendo que nuestro paso por El Calafate sea aún mejor de lo que esperabamos.
El departamento es muy lindo, super cómodo, tiene todo lo necesario.
Además ellos son una familia hermosa!
Los recomendamos!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por tus hermosos comentarios! Fue un placer ayudarlos en su estadía. Siempre serán bienvenidos!!Saludos desde la Patagonia!!Jenny y Juan

reviews.comments: El alojamiento de Juan y Jenny es excelente! La casa muy amplia y cómoda, muy limpia y la presión del agua de la ducha espectacular! La casa está lo suficientemente lejos del centro como para no tener que aguantar el lío de gente, pero lo suficientemente cerca como para llegar caminando en pocos minutos... Juan es guía de montaña y Jenny de turismo, nos dieron un montón de información y nos recomendaron excursiones, rutas, lugares, etc, tanto para Calafate como para el Chaltén.Sin duda, la mejor experiencia que tuve hasta el momento en Airbnb. Lo recomiendo 1000%!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias chicos!!!!Nos encanto ayudarlos, aconsejarles y que estén en nuestro hogar!!!Saludos desde Patagonia!!!

reviews.comments: Juan y Jenny nos recibieron con la más buena onda! Abiertos a nos ayudar en lo que necesitamos, nos hicieron sentir cómodos como si estuviéramos realmente en casa. La casa es cómoda y está bien conservada.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitar nuestra casa y hogar!!!Saludos desde Patagonia!!

reviews.comments: Excelente lugar, muy bien ubicado. Los anfitriones fueron muy acogedores ayudándonos incluso con buenos datos para nuestra visita. Completamente recomendable.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos!!!

reviews.comments:
Juan y Jenny son unos anfitriones espectaculares, gracias a todas sus diligencias y esfuerzos logramos tener unos días maravillosos en El Calafate.
La casita es muy acogedora y limpia y está situada en una calle muy tranquila pero muy cerca del centro.
Si van al Calafate, les recomiendo quedarse con Juan y Jenny porque ellos harán todo lo posible para que la pases bien.
Muchas gracias a los dos!!!
reviews.response: Que placer ayudarlos!!! Muy linda visita!! Muchas gracias!!!!

reviews.comments: Fue un placer quedarnos con Juan y Jenny, grandes anfitriones! Siempre atentos a cualquier necesidad y ayudando a organizar el viaje con ideas sobre que hacer. Sin duda un sitio donde quedarse si viajan al Calafate!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias es un placer¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Es un sitio muy recomendado. Juan y Jenny son excelentes anfitriones, muy amables, con mucha experiencia como guías y están dispuestos a colaborarte en todo momento para hacer de la estancia en el calafate una experiencia inolvidable.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias¡¡¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Son una pareja encantadora. Estuve en familia, incluidos los niños, los suyos, claro. Pasaría más días con ellos
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!!!Fue un placer tenerlos con nosotros!!!

reviews.comments: Personas encantadoras, Siempre pendientes de como nos sentiamos, su hospitalidad y amabilidad hicieron que la experiencia calafate sea muy placentera, Gracias a toda la familia por su cariño y atenciones.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por los hermosos comentarios!!!Saludos desde Patagonia para el hermoso Caribe!!!

reviews.comments: Juan y Jenny nos hicieron sentir como en casa. Super amables y hospitalarios, estuvieron pendientes de nosotras en todo momento y nos ayudaron a sacar el máximo provecho de nuestros dias en el Calafate! El apartamento está bien situado y muy bien equipado. Es muy acogedor. ¡Es la opción ideal para disfrutar de la zona de forma más personalizada! Más que recomendable!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias¡¡¡Fue un placer ayudarlas con todo¡¡Gracias por elegir Patagonia¡¡

reviews.comments: Jenny y Juan fueron unos fantásticos anfitriones, tanto antes como durante nuestra estancia en su magnífico loft. La comunicación fue genial antea de llegar, y las indicaciones y recomendaciones que nos dieron fueron muy acertadas. Elena y yo disfrutamos mucho de nuestra estancia en El Calafate, en gran parte gracias a las recomendaciones de Jenny. Además, tienen un par de gatos muy simpáticos! Muchas gracias por todo!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias chicos por visitarnos!!!Saludos!!

reviews.comments:
Todo excelente con los anfitriones!!

Muy limpio el lugar y acogedor

Recomendable!!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Elvia y Carlos!!Fue un placer tenerlos en casa!!!Saludos a Mexico!!!!

reviews.comments:
Juan and Jenny are great hosts! I totally recomend them. The house was great! Very comfortable, warm and quite! It was far better than what you can see at the pictures. 

Also Juan and Jenny are mountain guides so the know all about trips and trekking and what you can do in Calafate. 

If I ever go to Calafate again I would gladly make a reservation in their home!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por estar en nuestra casa y hogar!!Saludos desde Patagonia!!

reviews.comments: It was a wonderful stay at Jenny y Juan’s house. They are nice and warm people and always give you help and suggestions. Their 2 boys are super cute! You have a fantastic view of the lake and the house is clean and spacious. It’s a perfect place if you want to have a space to your own to relax after hiking or long trip. Highly recommended!

Juan and Jenny’s place is the perfect getaway in Patagonia. The place is a bit outside of the main strip but we were mostly using the place to relax between adventures. They were very friendly and had great communication throughout the process. I would highly recommend them as hosts for your next stay.

Приезжали вчетвером. Удобно, продумано, стильно, интересно.
Здесь с вами поделятся всеми тонкостями и помогут грамотно организовать своё время. А рыжий кот искренне обмурчит :)
Рекомендую! :)

My buddy and I loved our stay at Jenny and Juan’s! They were super responsive, extremely nice and thoughtful and the place was even better than I expected. We will be back!
Thanks for everything!
-Kevin and Brett
reviews.response: It was a pleasure!!

reviews.comments:
My short stay at Juan & Jenny’s place was a delight.  Spacious, super clean and comfortable with everything I needed and more.  Loved watching the sunrise on the mountains and the flamingos on the lake from the loft's upstairs windows.  
Communication with Jenny was outstanding, with immediate responses to any questions, local tips, and transportation arrangements.  Next visit I'll explore the glaciers with Juan & Jenny.
reviews.response: Thanks lotssss!!!

reviews.comments:
Definitely recommended. Jenny and Juan were wonderful hosts, that helped us from washing our clothing to helping us book our tours (they are very experienced tour guides), from calling to food delivery to welcoming us with cake. 
The house is not at city center, but the village is so small that you will only have to walk a few blocks to be in the “crowds”. 
It’s a simple but very cozy loft, with really good heating and a great shower. 
We truly felt welcome in this place. I hope I can come back someday. :)
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos!!!

reviews.comments: O espaço oferecido é perfeito, os anfitriões são muito atenciosos e a localização é muito tranquila. Recomendo 100%!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos!!

reviews.comments: Juan e Jenny são ótimos hosts, que trabalham há décadas com turismo em El Calafate e curtem muito receber. Ajudaram muito com dicas e orientações sobre a cidade e passeios. A casa é ótima, aconchegante, muito limpa e arrumada, com chuveiro forte e quente e ótimo aquecimento ambiente. Fica próxima de padaria, restaurantes e um mercadinho, e a 15 minutos de caminhada agradável até o centro comercial de El Calafate. Recomendo e com certeza ficarei lá de novo. Muitíssimo obrigado Juan e Jenny.

What a great place! Sparkling clean, warm and cozy with a nice view! Jenny and Juan were great, attentive hosts, and we loved their oasis of a loft. Easily walkable to restaurants and shops, and the bakery around the corner is a winner.

Eine Unterkunft fuer drei Personen ist sehr gut ausgestattet und warm. Die Gastgeber sind in jeder Hinsicht super hilfsbereit und kennen sich sehr gut aus. Wir können die Unterkunft nur wärmsten empfehlen

Jenny est une hôtesse exceptionnelle de gentillesse et de prévenance.  Elle est guide de profession et nous a donné d'excellents conseils de visites tout en assurant les réservations. La location est confortable, bien située et d'une grande propreté. Adresse incontournable si vous allez à El calafate !

Beautiful loft located in a quiet area nearby the main strip of El Calafate. Jenny and Juan were incredibly welcoming and helped plan out my trip and transport. Checking in and out was no problem, and the loft itself is lovely. Beautiful view of the mountains in the morning (and the fresh bread from the bakery was very much appreciated). Definitely plan on staying there again, thank you! Gracias (et merci)!
reviews.response: It was a pleasure!!!

reviews.comments:
Juan & Jenny were splendid hosts. Prior to the trip they were communicative and willing to assist us with travel itineraries. They arranged for a private car to pick us up from the airport and an independent tour of Perito Moreno glacier since our flight didn't arrive until after the major groups had left. We found the home to be welcoming, warm, and proximately located to the town square. Jenny also provided for a small nightcap package and helped us arrange transport to the bus station for our onward trip to Puerto Natales. They also recommended some great places to grab a bite to eat...five star dining at affordable prices. 

We definitely recommend them to anyone looking to visit Patagonia and El Calafate. We wished we could have stayed longer. High advisability!!
reviews.response: Thanks lotssss!!! It Was a pleasure!!

reviews.comments: Nous avons été très touchés par l'accueil reçu chez Jenny & Juan. C'est un couple vraiment inspirant, à la recherche de l'équilibre entre travail et éducation de leurs enfants. Nous étions de passage à El Calfate essentiellement pour l'expédition sur le glacier Perito Moreno. Etant guide de profession et parlant un français excellent, Jenny nous a montré sur des cartes ce que nous allions faire lors de cette expédition et nous a permis de nous approprier la région de cette façon. Nous avons également reçu un petit fascicule avec les oiseaux à observer sur la Bahia Redonda: flamants roses, oies de Magellan, bécasses et ce, à 5 minutes à pieds en face de chez eux! Du cake maison en passant par les lectures laissées à notre disposition dans la maison, nous avons en résumé été charmés!

Jenny and Juan and their 2 children are the perfect hosts! The place is very comfortable and so charming with Juan's wood work and Jenny's charm! They're all charming! I highly recommend their home, their hosting and El Calafate is magical. Enjoy!

A casa é muito limpa, organizada e fofa! O chuveiro é ótimo e bem quentinho e os cobertores são uma delícia, caso vá no inverno como nós, fiquei tranquilo que vai dormir bem! Tinha bolinho, café e frutas nos esperamos. Recomendamos e gostaria de voltar muitas vezes :))

Juan and Jenny are wonderful hosts. The reviews are accurate. They are very friendly and welcoming. They are also extremely helpful with any questions you have--they are knowledgabe about all of the area excursions and will help you look at the weather to choose the best day for each activity. They ensure you have exactly the experience you want. I was there both to vacation and also study for an exam, and they made sure to put an office chair at the desk. It was very thoughtful! The apartment is great--it has lots of room, and has a kitchen with a lot of good tools. The WiFi was good for me, even for streaming shows. The view out the windows upstairs--of the lake and mountains, is beautiful and calming. I would definitely stay there again!
reviews.response: Muchísimas gracias¡¡¡¡Suerte en Francia¡¡¡¡¡Te extrañaremos¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Juan & Jenny are extremely welcoming! The loft is a bit walking distance (15-20mins) from the town, but there is a big supermarket nearby where we bought cheap food to cook. When we first come in, their neighbors made us cakes and their kids gave us lavender :) If you like cats, they have two cats and one of them is really playful.
reviews.response: Thanks lots, it was a pleasure¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Nous avons passé une excellente semaine dans le logement de Juan et Jenny. Cet appartement idéalement situé nous a offert tout le confort nécessaire pour nous et notre fils de 20 mois. Juan et Jenny, habitant juste au dessus, ont été d un accompagnement précieux tant au niveau du logement que des découvertes de la région qu'ils affectionnent, qui les passionne et qu'ils nous transmettent volontiers. Vraiment un gros pincement de devoir rentrer après cette fabuleuse semaine. 
À bientôt à Toulouse! ;)
reviews.response: Merci merci merci¡¡¡

reviews.comments: We really enjoyed our stay at Jenny & Juan's place. The house was very clean and cosy. Jenny was great, she's very knowledgeable about the area and helped us organizing a tour on the Perito Moreno. We totally recommend this place and would definitely come back.
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡¡It was a pleasure¡¡¡

reviews.comments: We had a wonderful stay with Juan and Jenny! The apartment is very nice, clean, and comfortable. We would certainly stay here again.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias fue un placer¡¡¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Juan and Jenny were lovely hosts!  We very much enjoyed our stay.  The space was clean, spacious, and great for our group of four.  They kindly gave us a ride into town (a short drive) and recommended some great restaurants and bars.  We especially loved the fresh lavender their son brought us before bed and the tasty bread and fruit they left us for breakfast.  Thanks, Juan and Jenny!
reviews.response: Your welcome¡¡¡I was a pleasure¡¡¡

reviews.comments: My girlfriend and I really enjoyed staying at Jenny's place, and especially her hospitality and help in overcoming so many difficulties of local life. It started badly as our plane from Ushuaia was routed to another city and then they transferred us to El Calafate by bus for many hours and we arrived very late. Nevertheless Jenny patiently waited and welcomed us at her beautiful loft. It did not stop there as the rental agency canceled our reservation due to late arrival and there were no cars available in the entire city that day. But Jenny tremendously helped us get a car from the rental company with negotiations in Spanish. She also helped us to get a fantastic tour to walk on ice at Perito Moreno. The loft itself is cozy and comfortable with everything taken care of from kitchen to shower to bed, and it also has a nice view to the lake. And their little kids are so cute to be around. Overall, a great place and amazing hosts, I will for sure recommend this place to my friends and hopefully will stay again some day.
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Juan and Jenny made our stay very enjoyable. The apartment is a standalone unit that has character and comfort. Jenny's English is very good and she was very helpful in helping us plan our time in El Calafate. Good value for the area.
reviews.response: Thanks lotsss

reviews.comments:
The house is great ,clean very well thought out and detailed.
The hosts are amazing and extremely nice  and will help in so many ways.
They are tour guides with very helpful tips.
The house is well located
A wonderful experience
enjoy - you will
reviews.response: Muchas graciassssss

reviews.comments: great place to stay - Jenny (the host) is charming and very helpful with great advice on where to go and what to see - both locally and further afield. the house is roomy and very clean. good value
reviews.response: Muchas gracias¡¡¡¡¡¡

reviews.comments: We arrived at jenny's place at 8.20pm for our two night stay and found that we had only minutes before the tour operator for our boat trip to see glaciers closes . Jenny dropped everything, including feeding her baby , jumped us all in the car( including crying baby) and rushed off to their office on the other side of town . We just made it , and had it not been for her actions - our trip to el calafate would have meant that we missed out on the best part of our trip. Thank you both so much! Little gestures like a welcome cake and fruit also appreciated.
reviews.response: It was a pleasure¡¡¡¡Thanks to come to Patagonia¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Jenny and Juan were wonderful in all kinds of ways. Their place is lovely and original. Juan built it decade ago as some of the earliest settler in town. The location is just a mile away from the town center that has all kinds of restaurants and shops. 

The most convenience part is that both Jenny and Juan work in the tourism/adventures industries, and since El Calafate is not so big, they're super well-connected with the people working there, and they provided wonderful information about visiting Perito Moreno and El Chalten. 

Even thought we tried having a coffee/dinner/breakfast session which never happened because of us being out most of the time, Jenny would welcome us home everyday, and we would greet their lovely kids and pets :) 

Great experience living here! Would come back anytime I can!
reviews.response: Thanks lots to come to Patagonia¡¡¡It was a pleasure have you here¡¡¡

reviews.comments: One of the best Airbnb that I stayed in my whole life. Jenny is amazing and is willing to help you with anything you need. 100% recommended!!
reviews.response: Fue un placer recibirte¡¡¡¡Nos encanto conocerte¡¡¡Buen viaje¡¡¡Un saludo muy grande a Brasil.

reviews.comments: Great hosts!
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡

reviews.comments: I stayed three times in Juan & Jenny's loft, and each time was thoroughly enjoyable. The loft is comfortable and well equipped, the internet is fast, and Juan & Jenny are fantastic hosts
Great hosts!
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡

reviews.comments: I stayed in the loft three times during my time in Patagonia. Jenny and Juan were the perfect hosts each time: warm, relaxed, and attentive to my needs. The loft is cute, clean and equipped. The bed is comfortable and the wifi fast and reliable.
reviews.response: Thanks lots to came to Patagonia¡¡¡¡¡Fue un placer conocerte ¡¡¡

reviews.comments: This is our second time staying with Jenny and Juan. We highly recommend staying here. Everything about it is perfect. They are especially gracious and friendly hosts, and their casa was perfect for our family of four. The location is close to town, has wonderful views, is clean and charming, and the hosts are the best!
reviews.response: Muchas graciasssssssss. You also were the best¡¡

reviews.comments: Staying at Juan and Jenny's casa was perfect in every way. They are a wonderful family, and their casa was everything we could want. It is clean, cute, close to town, well-equipped and was perfect for our trip to El Calafate. From the time we booked until we left, Jenny was amazing at communicating and opening up her service to help in any way. She offered suggestions on things to do, and reached out ahead of our trip to book the big ice tour for us. Even after we left, she continued to stay in touch to make sure the rest of our Patagonia trip was going well. I highly recommend staying here - not only will you have a wonderful experience, but you will gain new friends!
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡¡It was a pleasure¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Jenny war eine nette Gastgeberin, die sehr hilfsbereit beim Organisieren von Ausflügen war. Die Lage am Rande der Stadt ist ruhig und die Unterkunft gemütlich.

Jenny and Jenny are amazing hosts. Incredibly helpful and responsive. They immediately made us feel at home and helped us in arranging the Big Ice tour and transport to the airport, as well giving us really valuable tips for the rest of our travels in Patagonia. The place is clean, cozy and has everything you need, plus it's short walkable distance to all the shops and restaurants. I would highly recommend staying here!
reviews.response: Thanks Lana¡¡¡It was a pleasure¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Juan and Jenny's house was amazing and in a perfect location off the main street in El Calafate. Jenny was extremely helpful, and she assisted us with booking the Big Ice trekking as well as our transfer back to the airport. She even gave us a ride into town on a couple of occasions and shared a beer with us. I would highly recommend this place for your stay in Patagonia!
reviews.response: Thanks for visiting!!!!  It was a pleasure!!!

reviews.comments:
Jenny & Juan are phenomenal hosts. Most organisation took place with Jenny who was happy to message or (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) or take calls about logistics and questions.
The townhouse is located at the front of their property. It has a couch and small dining table downstairs, a fridge/freezer and adequate cooking utensils (gas stove and oven, kettle, but no microwave). The bathroom is clean and hot water is stable. Upstairs (may not be suitable for small children) is a loft with some views of the lake and a comfortable bed with a TV (didn't use it) and a sitting desk. The whole house is heated by a gas heater downstairs and kept the house warm even during the cold nights (down to 0C). It also means clothing will dry quickly when hung up. Wifi single is good throughout and connection is stable. Overall it is extremely comfortable.
Location is a bit further out from town. It takes 20-25min walk to town or ARS70-80 taxi. It is a very straight and pleasant walk if the weather is ok. There is a small bakery and general store (no fruit or vegetables) and a butcher around the corner. Otherwise you need to go toward town about 15min walk to a larger supermarket.
Before arrival, Jenny arranged the Big Ice tour with Hielo y Aventura for the same retail price but it meant they would pick us up from a nearby hotel, whereas the company refused to do that for me directly. She washed our clothes (for small price) which was welcome after many days hiking. Jenny also was available to answer any questions about the town, the hike, and booked an airport transfer too, allowing a late checkout for free on that day.
Many thanks Jenny and Juan!
reviews.response: Your welcome¡¡Have nice trip¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
This is a great house to stay in El Calafate - clean, perfect location, and well equipped to make it feel like home. Jenny and Juan were also great hosts, giving advice about the area and sharing a few drinks together. 
I would highly recommend a stay at this house.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias Britney!!It was a pleasure!!!

reviews.comments: This place was spectacular, and so were Jenny and Juan! Jenny met us at the airport, and gave us a tour of the town on the way in, making sure to point out some points of interest, such as banks, restaurants, etc. They both also happen to be experienced guides, and are very knowledgeable about each and every trek you may have interest in. Jenny will even provide you with maps, and help you with booking your tour or private transportation if needed-- she drove us to the travel agency herself! As for the loft, it was better than described. Very warm, clean, and just lovely! The kitchen was well equipped-- we cooked a few meals while there. It is a short walk (10-15min) to town, however we enjoyed it, as it is quite scenic. We hope to return someday! I would highly recommend this loft to anyone.
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡¡It was wonderful to met you¡¡

reviews.comments: Jenny was very helpful with everything. She went over and above to make sure that our arrival and departure were smooth. We communicated through (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) and she offered to book tours for us, she figured who our guide was from our Perito Moreno tour so she could explain to the guide where to be dropped off near the Casa Loft, she booked the transfer for the airport... There were little things that made our stay more confortable: a moka coffee maker, tea bags, fruit, toiletries,... Both Jenny and Juan were very nice and friendly, and we had great conversations with them during our stay. We felt at home and it was  a great relaxing last two days, after an exhausting week-long trip to Patagonia.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias¡¡¡¡Fue un placer recibirlos¡¡¡Buen viaje de regreso¡¡¡

reviews.comments: Jenny and Juans place was awesome. Exactly as described and super nice hosts. They were extremely helpful and took time to touch base every day and had information on absolutely every thing we wanted to know and more. We extended our stay by a night but could have stayed more if time permitted. Thank you!
reviews.response: It was a pleasure¡¡¡Have nice trip¡¡¡Thanks to visit patagonia¡¡

reviews.comments:
Juan e Jenny foram extremamente solícitos antes e durante nossa estadia. São muito gentis e generosos. O casal tem muita experiência com turismo, e esclareceram todas as nossas dúvidas, inclusive nos emprestando mapas e livros-guia sobre a fauna e flora locais. Mesmo antes de chegarmos, Jenny nos ajudou a fazer uma reserva de última hora a um passeio na geleira, auxiliando a acelerar o processo antes que a agência fechasse. Por terem tanta experiencia, nos ofereceram várias opções de passeio, indicando as melhores agências para cada um deles sempre que solicitados. Acabamos optando por contratar um passeio privado com o próprio Juan, que nos guiou em uma trilha em El Chaltén inclusive compartilhando um mate.

A casa fica à distância de uma caminhada rápida até o centro turístico, e fica razoavelmente próxima a um supermercado, padarias e kioskos. Apesar de estar em uma rua de terra a casa está a meio quarteirão da principal avenida (essa sim asfaltada)  que cruza a cidade toda. O bairro é muito tranquilo, seguro, e tem uma pista de caminhada que margeia o lago, com uma vista muito bonita. 

O apartamento é aconchegante, limpo, bem decorado, com ótimo banheiro e cozinha bem equipada. Extremamente charmoso e romântico, rústico na medida correta com uma excelente banheira para relaxar após dias preenchidos com trilhas e passeios. Sem dúvidas recomendo o local.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias¡¡¡¡¡Fue un placer recibirlos¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Jenny&Juan were THE most lovely and helpful hosts we could've wished to find.
They provided us with every information we could possibly have needed and organised our tours to the National Park. On top the apt is very nicely decorated and warm. You'll also find all the equipment needed for cooking and stuff alike.
Totally recommend staying with them and their lovely family in El Calafate.
reviews.response: Thanks a lots for all Constantin and Valentin!!!Have nice trip!!!

reviews.comments:
Jenny and Juan are great hosts.  They suggested and booked tours for us -- without charging extra, and even opened up their home for us over dinner.  

The loft space is clean and a short walk -- 10 minutes -- to downtown.  Right across the street from us is the wetland reserve where we could see pink flamingos and many other bird species.

We will definitely stay here again if we come to Calafate.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias ¡¡I was a pleasure to meet you¡¡¡

reviews.comments: There are not enough good things to say about Juan and Jenny. They are truly super hosts. Before our arrival, Jenny took our information and arranged a walking tour of the Perito Moreno Glacier the morning after our arrival. Jenny met us at the airport and on our drive back to the property pointed out all the places we should try in town. She also shared with us some interesting cultural points unique to El Calafate. Juan is constantly adding to and improving the property and we felt welcome in their home immediately. They shared mate and their home with us. We ran into some trouble leaving and they helped us to a quick resolution. Staying with them was a wonderful experience and we will be looking to stay with them again if we are lucky enough to find ourselves in El Calafate.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!!!Los esperamos nuevamente!!!!Exitos en sus emprendimientos!!

reviews.comments: Jenny and Juan are the friendliest, best hosts! Such nice people. Their house is very comfortable and clean and has everything one might need. They also have an adorable cat Jack that came to visit us:) Jenny made us pastries which were delicious! Location is great. Highly recommended!!!
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡¡Jonathan¡¡We really enjoyed your visit¡¡¡¡Have nice trip¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Very comfortable and great location. Easy walk into town and nice cafe and shops nearby. Jenni & Juan are excellent hosts. Juan is a guide at PeritonMoreno Glacier and he lead the Spanish speaking group while we were in the English group. Jenni knows about all the activities in the area and suggested a great itinerary for us. 

The apartment is self contained and far enough away from the house to be private. They have two very friendly cats so if you are a cat lover you must stay here. If you don't like cats (or if you love them and get bored of them) then it is easy to lock them out!

Highly recommend staying here and would come back if I am ever lucky enough to visit El Calafate again
reviews.response: Thanks lots Tony¡¡¡ I was a pleasure to have you here¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
We had a great experience. Communication before we got there was great. We were able to arrange pick up at the airport and went directly to the apt. Jenny was just arriving and gave us an overview of the apt and town. We also discussed the glacier tour we had prearranged for the following day.  
Overall, great experience. The apt is nice and had what we needed. It was a bit noisy one night due to a neighbor dog. 
We had a great time on our excursions and in town. It was a 10/15 minutes walk to easily meet our friends and go to dinner in town.
reviews.response: Thanks Hattie¡¡¡Have nice trip back home¡¡¡

reviews.comments: My husband, sister and I had a very nice stay in Juan and Jenny's loft. They were both welcoming and were accommodating when we arrived much later than expected. Their communication was great before and during our trip. They went above and beyond to tell us about activities in the area and to help us book tours and massages. The loft itself is extremely nice, very clean, comfortable and has a great design.
reviews.response: Thanks lots Whitney¡¡I was a pleasure to have you here¡¡¡Have nice trip around the world¡¡

reviews.comments: lovely, clean, quiet and spacious loft! felt like home and exactly what we needed after weeks of being on the move.  nice little touches like tea, apples, chocolates and baked goods made our time at Jenny & Juan's special.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por visitarnos!!!Nos vemos pronto!!!!

reviews.comments:
We stayed at Jenny&Juan place for couple of days in April. We really enjoyed  it. The loft is spacious, bright, clean and tidy. I loved wooden details and shelves everywhere in the house, which made it very cosy. We also appreciated such small, but important things as two towels for every person, shampoo and conditioner, soap in the bathroom, mayonnaise and ketchup in the fridge etc, not to mention the full plate of welcome-sweets and cookies.

The loft is not in the center of the town, but within 10-15 minutes walk. However, there is a small supermarket and a wonderful bakery just a minute from the house, where you can get anything you need.

Jenny was really very friendly and helpful, she helped us with organizing Perito Moreno trip and gave lots of useful information. She has a very warm and open personality.

We would undoubtedly recommend this place to anyone!
reviews.response: Thanks a lots Monika and family. We also loved your stay¡¡All the best for your trip in South America¡¡¡Best regards from Calafate¡¡Jenny and Juan

reviews.comments:
Our experience was so good that we decided to stay another day. Please see previous review for details of our experience.


Nuestra experiencia fue tan buena que decidimos estar un día adicional. Ver reseña anterior para detalles de nuestra experiencia.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!!!

reviews.comments:
The view of the loft is amazing. Beds are very confortable.  Supermarkets and bakeries nearby. Good neighborhood. Ambiance is very peaceful and warms your soul. The loft is fully equipped.

Jenny and Juan are great hosts, persons, experienced guides and world travelers. They are willing to help visitors to get the best experience in Calafate.

----------------------
La vista del apartamento es hermosa. Las camas muy cómodas. Supermercados y cafes cerca. Buena  y segura localización. El ambiente es de paz y te calienta el alma.

Jenny y Juan son excelentes huéspedes y personas. Ambos son guías experimentados y viajeros mundiales. Nos sirvieron de gran ayuda para disfrutar en Calafate.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias!!Fue un placer conocerlos!!!!Saludos a Puerto Rico!!!

reviews.comments:
What a great property and great Airbnb host! We were four guys traveling in Argentina and Juan & Jenny's loft was perfect for us. There were two beds on the ground floor and two beds in the loft. We were able to use the kitchen to cook and the hot water and wifi worked really well.

Upon arrival, Jenny welcomed us and gave us detailed explanations on where things were in the city as well as information about the best activities to do. She is a tour guide so knew a lot! And her husband, Juan, works for the glacier tour company and coincidentally was one of our tour leaders when we did the trip.

If you are traveling to El Calafate, this is a perfect place to stay!
reviews.response: Thanks lots!!!!!I was a pleasure to have had you here and help you with everything in Patagonia!!!

reviews.comments: We had a perfect stay at Jenny's and Juan's place.
reviews.response: Thanks a lots!!!I was pleasure to have you here!!!Best regards from Patagonia!!!

reviews.comments: We loved staying at Jenny and Juan's guest house. We were warmly welcomed by Jenny and their adorable baby. Juan ended up being our glacier tour guide the following day. Highly recommend!
reviews.response: Thank you for coming to our home and Patagonia!!I was a pleasure!Jenny and Juan

reviews.comments: Love the unique space that Jenny and Juan created. Large comfortable living space and kitchen area where I spent most of my time. Jenny is super approachable and friendly. It was awesome she mentioned pink flemingo's are in the area, I didn't know they migrate to that part. Be aware, It's about 15-20 min's walk to the main busy part of town. Also (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN) maps doesn't show the correct location of the house. Highly recommended.
reviews.response: Muchas gracias"!!!Thank you to visit Patagonia and our home!!

reviews.comments: Only the best memories about our stay in El Calafate. Thanks Juan&Jenny we have only wonderful memories. Our stay in Casa Loft we called "stay in 5 star hotel". We loved it very much. Juan&Jenny - they were so helpful: before and duing our trip they asked if we need any help, also help us wit info about how  to spend our time in El Chalten the best way and help us with Perito Moreno tour. In Casa Loft we felt like in a home. We highly recomend Juan&Jenny! Thanks for the time in El Calafate! Muchas gracias! Saludos de Letonia :)
reviews.response: Hola!!!Thank you to visit Patagonia and our home!!I was a pleasure to have you here!!!Saludos desde Patagonia!!!!

reviews.comments: The unit was perfect and Juan and Jenny were both very gracious hosts. Upon arrival Jenny made sure to show us around the unit and answer any questions we had about El Calafate. They both have experience with tours in the area and were able to provide excellent recommendations on exciting activities. While in Chile, my friends and I were trying to book Big Ice with Helio y Aventura but the reservation required us to be at their Argentinian location. Jenny offered to go to the office for us and make the reservation so that we would be guaranteed a spot on the trek. Would definitely book with Juan and Jenny again in the future.
reviews.response: Thanks to visit our home and Patagonia¡¡¡I was a pleasure to have you here¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Causa Loft Vista was a great place to stay, there was lots and lots of room  downstairs including a fully equipped kitchen with full gas cooker and oven. It was ideal for self catering which we were desperate to do having eaten out everyday for a week or so. Upstairs there is also a big space with a very big comfortable bed and a really good view outside of Lago Argentina and the mountains beyond. The whole place is very clean and we had a fabulous week there. It is in a good neighbourhood with an excellent Panaderia nearby, also a really good barber and supermarket 5 min walk. Downtown is 15min walk. Jenny and Juan are very busy people, Jenny is a free lance tour guide and Juan a mountain guide, they also have a young child but despite their work and family commitments they were really helpful to us giving advice, picking up and dropping off at the bus station and Jenny saved us a great deal of money and time in negotiating an expensive tour on our behalf. They live next door and they spoke with us each day to see how we were or needed anything,this was not intrusive, however.
They are a really nice family and have no hesitation in recommending a stay here.
reviews.response: Thank you to visit Patagonia and our home!!!!

reviews.comments: Jenny and Juan were wonderful.  Answered all our questions. Gave a gift of baked goods to make us feel so welcome in this cute little place -- which is, by the way, in a lovely, quiet location, with a lake view, just far enough away from the center of town.  They even provided tips and a weather forecast for the rest of our trip.  Highly recommended!  Charming house.
reviews.response: Thank you very much for the comments!!!Thank to come to Patagonia and to our home!!!I was a pleasure to have you here!!!

reviews.comments:
Jenny and Juan are 5 star hosts and simply delightful.  Our stay in El Calafate was all the better for having met and stayed in their lovely cosy apartment. They went out of their way to ensure we had everything we needed and helped us immensely to plan and facilitate our trips to the National Park.  

The apartment was very comfortable, warm, reliable and fast WIFI, great shower with reliable hot water, good location, walking distance to supermarkets, nice view from bedroom, excellent desk and working area.  

We highly recommend Jenny and Juan - they're excellent hosts where nothing is a problem.  This is a family we’d dearly love to meet again sometime in the future.
reviews.response: Thank for your wonderful comments!!!I was lovely to met you!!!!Thankssss lots!!!

reviews.comments:
Jenny et Juan ont fait bien plus que de simplement nous accueillir.
Un logement agréable, une ambiance chaleureuse, des conseils avisés concernant les choses à voir ou à faire absolument à El Calafate et les alentours...
Encore merci pour ces moments partagés et à bientôt en France, en Argentine ou ailleurs !!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias les filles¡¡¡Nous avons beaucoup profite votre visite¡¡¡Saludos desde Patagonia¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
Jenny was really good host, she is always open for communication and helpful. Juan speaks very little English, but he is very friendly too. Jenny helped us with excursions choice and buying, and told us everything we need to know about El Calafate. 
The apartment is 2 level, and there is perfect view on the lake from 2nd floor. There is heater, so there is always warm. Kitchen is fully equipped, everything is clean and functional. Internet connection is good as well (it was important for us).
reviews.response: Thank a lots¡¡We really enjoyed your visit and help you in everything¡¡I really loved to listen music with you and learn from your country¡¡¡¡Have a really nice trip¡¡¡Saludos desde Patagonia¡¡¡

reviews.comments:
We had a great experience at Jenny and Juan's in el Calafate. They welcomed us very warm and friendly! 
The house we stayed in was very clean and cosy. We got some great advises about the stay in el calafate and they even arranged a horseriding tour. Should we go back to el Calafate, we would defenitely ask Jenny and Juan if we could stay at their place again! Thanks!
reviews.response: Thanks lots¡¡¡We really enjoyed your visit¡¡¡Saludos desde la Patagonia¡¡

reviews.comments:
Just perfect !!!
L'appartement est parfait avec notamment cette vue splendide de la chambre que l'on voit très bien sur les photos. Appartement propre et très fonctionnel avec tout ce qu'il faut. Juan & Jenny nous ont très bien accueilli (dès l'aéroport sur demande) et nous ont également très bien conseillé sur ce qu'il y a à faire dans la région. Pas besoin d'agence de voyage!! Ce sont également des gens très chaleureux qui nous ont aidé avec nos petits traquas...merci encore ;-).
Je vous recommande vivement cette location.
Xavier
reviews.response: Muchas gracias chicos por visitarnos!!Nos encanto conocerlos!!!Saludos desde la patagonia!!

reviews.comments: Jenny and Juan made us feel so welcome. Nothing was too much trouble for them, including taking us to the bus station for our trip to Perito Moreno and again when we were leaving. They also gave good advice about places to visit in El Calafate. The apartment was just as described with lovely views from the loft/bedroom area. We thoroughly enjoyed out time in their lovely space. We recommend them unreservedly.
reviews.response: Thank you to stay in our home and in Patagonia!!We have really enjoyed your visit!!!Sending regards from Patagonia!!

reviews.comments:
Muchas Gracias!
We had a great time at Juan and Jenny's place. We enjoyed the lovely care and the beautiful house. They gave us very useful advice and explanations regarding the glacier and Patagonia. In the house we liked the good heating, fresh towels, the huge and comfortable bed with television and nice view over the lake.
To sum up: it was a great stay at calafate, sadly just a very short one – so we would like to come back some day.

Fue un tiempo maravilloso en la casa de Juan y Jenny.  Prepararon todo con mucho cariño y nos dieron muy buenos consejos por el Glacier Perrito Moreno y la Patagonia. Lasa casa es bien calientita, tiene una cama grande con tele y una linda vista al lago. Nos encanto el tiempo en su hogar y queremos volver con mas tiempo!
reviews.response: Muchas gracias por estar en nuestro casa y hogar!!Saludos desde Patagonia!!
